module.name: Java SSH
module.description: Provides a Java applet to access the system shell using SSH.
module.changelog: *2.11.2* Publisher and licensing *2.11.1* Replace Java SSH Client with one that works, and is signed. *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
